request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /business-data

**Description**: Returns ProcessLog

**Full URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/api](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/business-data/process/{id}

**Method:** POST

**Parameters (Params):**

- id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Parameters (Body):**

- parameters (JSON, mandatory)
- report_type (String, optional)
- print_format_id (Int32, optional)
- report_type (String, optional)
- print_format_id (Int32, optional)
- is_summary (Bool, optional)
- browser_id (Int32, optional)
- selections (JSON, optional)
- workflow_id (Int32, optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/business-data/process/0' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "parameters":{
        "M_Product_Category_ID":50000,
        "C_AcctSchema_ID":101
    },
    "report_type":"png",
    "print_format_id":0,
    "report_view_id":0,
    "is_summary":false,
    "browser_id":0,
    "selections":{},
    "workflow_id":0
}'

 ```

**Example Answer:**

``` json
{
    "id": 140,
    "name": "",
    "description": "",
    "instance_id": 1001242,
    "is_error": false,
    "summary": "Creado=0, Actualizado=3",
    "result_table_name": "",
    "is_processing": false,
    "last_run": "2024-03-14T15:19:48Z",
    "logs": [
        {
            "record_id": 0,
            "log": "Actualizado"
        },
        {
            "record_id": 0,
            "log": "Creado"
        }
    ],
    "process_intance_parameters": []
}

 ```

**Common mistakes:**

- The role does not have the necessary permissions
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "With your current role and settings, you cannot run Process \n\nYou don't have the privileges (your Role does not allow to access the information)",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- Process not found
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Process * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- ID field does not have a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Process",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /business-data

**Description**: Retorna ProcessLog

**Full URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/api](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/business-data/report/{id}

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params):**

- id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Parametros (Body):**

- parameters (JSON, Mandatory)
- report_type (String, Optional)
- print_format_id (Int32, Optional)
- report_type (String, Optional)
- print_format_id (Int32, Optional)
- is_summary (Bool, Optional)
- browser_id (Int32, Optional)
- selections (JSON, Optional)
- workflow_id (Int32, Optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/business-data/report/140' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "parameters":{
        "M_Product_Category_ID":50000,
        "C_AcctSchema_ID":101
    },
    "report_type":"png",
    "print_format_id":0,
    "report_view_id":0,
    "is_summary":false,
    "browser_id":0,
    "selections":{},
    "workflow_id":0
}'

 ```

**Answer Example:**

``` json
{
    "id": 140,
    "name": "",
    "description": "",
    "instance_id": 1001240,
    "is_error": false,
    "summary": "Creado=0, Actualizado=3",
    "result_table_name": "",
    "is_processing": false,
    "last_run": "2024-03-14T15:17:43Z",
    "logs": [
        {
            "record_id": 0,
            "log": "Actualizado"
        },
        {
            "record_id": 0,
            "log": "Creado"
        }
    ],
    "process_intance_parameters": []
}

 ```

**Commons Errors**

- The role does not have the necessary permissions
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "With your current role and settings, you cannot run Process \n\nYou don't have the privileges (your Role does not allow to access the information)",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- Lack of product category ID
    

``` json
{
    "id": 140,
    "name": "",
    "description": "",
    "instance_id": 1001230,
    "is_error": true,
    "summary": "Fill mandatory fields: Product Category",
    "result_table_name": "",
    "is_processing": false,
    "last_run": "2024-03-15T13:47:39Z",
    "logs": [],
    "process_intance_parameters": []
}

 ```

- Missing account schema id
    

``` json
{
    "id": 140,
    "name": "",
    "description": "",
    "instance_id": 1001232,
    "is_error": true,
    "summary": "Fill mandatory fields: Accounting Schema",
    "result_table_name": "",
    "is_processing": false,
    "last_run": "2024-03-15T13:48:59Z",
    "logs": [],
    "process_intance_parameters": []
}

 ```

- Account schema ID not found
    

``` json
{
    "id": 140,
    "name": "",
    "description": "",
    "instance_id": 1001234,
    "is_error": true,
    "summary": "Not Found - C_AcctSchema_ID=1",
    "result_table_name": "",
    "is_processing": false,
    "last_run": "2024-03-15T13:49:45Z",
    "logs": [],
    "process_intance_parameters": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | Date | **Auto** | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document |

**Endpoint**: POST /business-data

**Description**: Retorna ProcessLog

**Full URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/api](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/business-data/process/{id}/workflow/{table_name}/{record_id}/{document_action}

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params):**

- id (Int32, Mandatory)
- table_name (String, Mandatory)
- record_id (Int32, Mandatory)
- document_action (String, Mandatory)
    

**Parameters (Body):**

- parameters (JSON, Mandatory)
- report_type (String, Optional)
- print_format_id (Int32, Optional)
- is_summary (Bool, Optional)
- browser_id (Int32, Optional)
- selections (JSON, Optional)
- workflow_id (Int32, Optional)
    

**Application example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/business-data/process/140/workflow/C_TaxCategory/120/AP' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "parameters":{
        "M_Product_Category_ID":50000,
        "C_AcctSchema_ID":101
    },
    "report_type":"png",
    "print_format_id":0,
    "report_view_id":0,
    "is_summary":false,
    "browser_id":0,
    "selections":{},
    "workflow_id":0
}'

 ```

**Answer Example :**

``` json
{
    "id": 140,
    "name": "",
    "description": "",
    "instance_id": 1001237,
    "is_error": false,
    "summary": "Created=0, Updated=3",
    "result_table_name": "",
    "is_processing": false,
    "last_run": "2024-03-15T13:52:21Z",
    "logs": [
        {
            "record_id": 0,
            "log": "Updated"
        },
        {
            "record_id": 0,
            "log": "Created"
        }
    ],
    "process_intance_parameters": []
}

 ```

**Commons Errors:**

- The role does not have the necessary permissions
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "With your current role and settings, you cannot run Process \n\nYou don't have the privileges (your Role does not allow to access the information)",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- Proccess not found
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Process * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- ID field does not have a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Process",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Control de cambios**

| **Version** | Date | **Auto** | Description of changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: POST /business-data

**Description**: Retorna ProcessLog

**Full URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io/api](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/business-data/process/{id}/window/{table_name}/{record_id}

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Params):**

- id (Int32, Mandatory)
    
- table_name (String, Optional)
    
- record_id (Int32, Optional)
    

**Parameters (Body):**

- parameters (JSON, Optional)
    
- report_type (String, Optional)
    
- print_format_id (Int32, Optional)
    
- report_view_id (Int32, Optional)
    
- is_summary (Bool, Optional)
    
- selections (JSON, Mandatory)
    
- table_name (String, Optional)
    
- record_id (Int32, Optional)
    
- workflow_id (Int32, Optional)
    
- document_action (String, Optional)
    

**Application example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/business-data/process/205/window/""/0' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "parameters":{
    },
    "report_type":"png",
    "print_format_id":0,
    "report_view_id":0,
    "is_summary":false,
    "browser_id":0,
    "selections":{
    },
    "table_name": "",
    "record_id":0,
    "workflow_id":0,
    "document_action":"png"
}'

 ```

**Answer Example:**

``` json
{
    "id": 205,
    "name": "",
    "description": "",
    "instance_id": 1001245,
    "is_error": false,
    "summary": "Cache Reset",
    "result_table_name": "",
    "is_processing": false,
    "last_run": "2024-03-15T13:56:02Z",
    "logs": [],
    "process_intance_parameters": []
}

 ```

**Errores Comunes:**

- The role does not have the necessary permissions
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "With your current role and settings, you cannot run Process \n\nYou don't have the privileges (your Role does not allow to access the information)",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- Proccess not found
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Process * Not found *",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- ID field does not have a valid value
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Process",
    "details": []
}

 ```
